name: The TV Room VR
description:
Immerse yourself into an unsolved mystery of two sisters that go missing during a stormy summer day. The scene you are stepping into is frozen in time; piece together a fragmented day and get closer to discovering what happened in the TV room.

Made for Global Game Jam 2017 - Waves

Global Game Jam

Credits

  • Lee Tran - Programming
  • Kim Koronya - Modeling
  • Mike Romaniak - Sound
  • Brittney Oberfeld - Story/Art/Production
